meta.description: Explore European digital identity scenarios in action. Test credential issuance and verification flows.

issue.title: Playground
issue.description: A safe sandbox for issuing demo documents and testing EUDI compatible verification flows. Try real issuance steps, scan QR codes, explore data sharing and see how digital identity behaves in practice.

howItWorks.title: How EUDI flows work
howItWorks.description: Playground lets you issue demo documents, run verification flows and understand the European Digital Identity (EUDI) standards behind them.

issuance.title: Issuance
issuance.description: You review sample data in a modal and confirm the document. A QR code is shown. Scanning it with Folio Wallet adds the document to the wallet.

presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.description: A verifier configures a request in a modal, choosing exactly which attributes are needed. A QR code is generated for the user to scan and consent to sharing.

lifecycle.title: Lifecycle
lifecycle.description: You can repeat issuance and verification with different settings to see how updates, selective disclosure and reuse of the same document work in practice.

issuanceTypes.title: How documents are issued in Playground
issuanceTypes.description: Each document follows a specific issuance type. Color labels on the cards show which flow is used.

authorization.title: Authorization
authorization.description: The issuer confirms your account. You sign in on their website, then approve the request in your wallet.

preAuthorized.title: Pre-authorized
preAuthorized.description: Issued automatically using your Digital Identity. You only confirm with biometrics.

transactionCode.title: Transaction Code
transactionCode.description: Requires a one time code provided by the organization.

presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.description: Issued by presenting another document and sharing only what is needed.

items.question: What is Playground?
items.answer: Playground is a sandbox that lets you try EUDI compatible issuance and verification flows without real user data.

items.question: Are these real documents?
items.answer: No. All documents here are demo samples for testing only. They have no legal effect and cannot be used in production.

items.question: Do I need a real EUDI Wallet?
items.answer: You need Folio Wallet on your phone to scan QR codes and see the documents in action. You do not need an officially certified national wallet to use this sandbox.

items.question: Which standards does Playground follow?
items.answer: Flows are based on the European Digital Identity Wallet Architecture and Reference Framework and use OpenID for Verifiable Credential Issuance and Verifiable Presentations under the hood.

items.question: Why do I start with Digital Identity?
items.answer: Digital Identity is the core document that other credentials can rely on. By issuing it once, you can reuse it in many verification scenarios.

items.question: Can I test verification without another device?
items.answer: Yes. You can open Folio Wallet and Playground on the same device or on two devices. QR codes work in both same device and cross device scenarios.
